Entries.69660007/q 958700/p Caroline/p Marnie/p: breezy/26 10/Evelyn 26 9 3 Jodi 24 8 2 Caroline 23 10 1 Marnie 25 11 0 farmer 29 14 0/skippable/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -4 3 true/speak Caroline "I can't help but feel it's something of a self insert."/speak Marnie "Really? So who do you think Clara is then?"/pause 500/emote Caroline 40/speak Caroline "Leah, possibly?"/pause 500/speak Marnie "Hmmm, maybe. She's not really train stewardess material though, is she?"/pause 1000/speak Evelyn "Horatio was really rather hopeless, wasn't he?#$b#I would've thought her better suited with Gozman.#$b#It's a pity he never confessed his feelings to her."/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/move farmer -2 0 3/move Jodi 0 1 1/faceDirection Marnie 1/faceDirection Evelyn 2/emote Evelyn 32/speak Jodi "Oh, hello @! Welcome to our book club. We were just discussing 'Camellia Station'.#$b#Have you read it?"/quickQuestion #I've been meaning to.#Oh yes, it was wonderful. I cried.#I tried, it wasn't for me.#Oh, I don't read.(break)speak Jodi "Oh... you should! Especially since it's dedicated to you.#$b#But I suppose with farm life you get very little time to read?"(break)speak Jodi "Oh, me too! Especially that ending. Who knew Elliott had such a romantic soul?$2"(break)speak Jodi "That's a pity. Especially since it's dedicated to you.#$b#I suppose his use of language does take a bit of getting used to."(break)speak Jodi "You don't? You're missing out. Still, to each their own, I guess."/pause 500/speak Evelyn "You know, I see a bit of Clara in you, @.#$b#With a few changes, of course, but she has your spirit, your determination. Your fierce dedication."/pause 500/emote farmer 16/speak Jodi "Oh...!#$b#I think our Elliott has feelings for you!$4"/quickQuestion #Don't be ridiculous!#Of course he does, doesn't everyone?#Well, they're certainly not reciprocated!#Oh, I know. I have feelings for him too!(break)speak Marnie "Oh, I wouldn't be so quick to scorn, if I were you. After all, he did dedicate this book to you.$1"(break)speak Caroline "Oh, I wouldn't say everyone.$4"(break)speak Jodi "Oh dear, you're going to break that young man's heart.$2"(break)speak Evelyn "Of course! Oh, to be young again and in love.$3"/pause 1500/speak Caroline "Well, I suppose you could join us, if you wanted?"/pause 500/emote farmer 56/pause 2000/end

Entries.69660008/q 958700/p Caroline/p Marnie/p: Near The Planet Core/26 10/Evelyn 26 9 3 Jodi 24 8 2 Caroline 23 10 1 Marnie 25 11 0 farmer 29 14 0/skippable/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -4 3 true/speak Caroline "Oh, I never thought our Elliott had it in him...#$b#It was more the sort of book I'd expect Abigail to read.$2"/speak Marnie "It kept me up late into the night. Every rattle of the wind and I was imaginging those ... those things... scratching at the shivering walls of my bio-tent.$2"/speak Evelyn "George kept grumbling that I was keeping him awake. But I had to know if Yutkin was going to make it!"/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/move farmer -2 0 3/move Jodi 0 1 1/faceDirection Marnie 1/faceDirection Evelyn 2/emote Evelyn 32/speak Jodi "Oh, hello @! Welcome to our book club. We were just discussing 'The Rise And Fall Of Planet Yazzo'.#$b#Have you read it?"/quickQuestion #I've been meaning to.#Oh yes, it was wonderful. I couldn't put it down!.#I tried, it wasn't for me.#Who has time to read?(break)speak Jodi "I understand. It took me a few goes to get into it myself."(break)speak Jodi "Really? You didn't find it a bit too creepy and dark?$2"(break)speak Jodi "Oh, me neither. It was a little too weird for my tastes.#$b#Sam seemed to enjoy it though."(break)speak Jodi "Of course, life must be very busy on the farm. "/pause 500/speak Evelyn "That confrontation in the ruins of the Grand Spire... when Captain Yutkin's friend disappeared...$2#$b#Oh, I couldn't sleep a wink! And when they only found his... Oh! *shudders*"/speak Marnie "It was a bit on the gruesome side.$2#$b#The writing style though... It really gave me chills!"/speak Jodi "He said you were his inspiration, @. Did you put those frightening ideas in his head?"/quickQuestion #Of course! Macabre is my middle name.#No! That's all him. Nothing to do with me.#I'm pretty sure he's inspired by the sea.(break)speak Marnie "Oh!$4#$b#Sorry, @, now I'm a little scared of you.$2"(break)speak Evelyn "I never knew such a poetic soul could harbor such a macabre imagination."(break)speak Caroline "Oh yes, the exoskeletons... the giant claws... I see it now!"/pause 1500/speak Caroline "Anyway, @, would you like to join us?"/pause 500/emote farmer 56/pause 1000/end
